description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+27 vs. AC

Hit: 2d10 + 9 damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Absalom uses bastard sword twice. He can take his move action between these attacks.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ cold, necrotic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature marked by Absalom)

+25 vs. Fortitude

Hit: Ongoing 45 cold and necrotic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends both). Each time an enemy takes damage from this power, Absalom or an ally within 10 squares of him gains 10 temporary hit points.

At-Will ✦ teleportation

Move

Effect: Absalom teleports 8 squares to a square adjacent to a creature marked by him and gains a fly speed equal to his speed (hover) until the end of his next turn.

At-Will 1/round ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Absalom alters his physical form to appear as a Medium living or undead dragonborn until he uses change shape again or until he drops to 0 hit points. He retains his statistics in his new form. His clothing, armor, and other possessions do not change. To assume a specific individual's form, he must have seen that individual. Other creatures can make a DC 41 Insight check to discern that the form is a disguise.

At-Will

Minor

Requirement: Absalom must not have a creature marked.

Effect: Absalom marks one enemy that he can see within 20 squares of him until the end of his next turn.

Recharge 6 ✦ fire, necrotic

Minor

Attack: Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+24 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d6 + 8 fire damage plus 2d6 + 8 necrotic damage, and Absalom slides the target 3 squares.

At-Will ✦ necrotic

Triggered

Trigger: A creature marked by Absalom ends its turn in a square not adjacent to Absalom.

Effect (Immediate Reaction): The triggering enemy takes 20 damage and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.

Resist 15 fire, 15 necrotic Immune disease, poison 		Init +20 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 38Fort 33Ref 34Will 35
Speed 8

Cha 26 (+19)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +19, History +19, Insight +20Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 25 | Insight 30

Equipment robes, bastard sword .
